Member Function Documentation

Result gaia::utility::Zipper::addToZip ( const gaia::base::String &  path,
CompressionMethod  method,
bool  excludePath 
)

Add a new file to an already opened zip file.

If the file does not exist, it creates and opens it.

Parameters:
[in]pathThe opened or created file's path
[in]methodThe compression method
[in]excludePathIf true, exclude path
Returns:
A Result of this operation

Initialize an instance of Zipper, it opens an existing zip file.
